statements: DELETE FROM Financial_Statements WHERE reconciled = FALSE;
DELETE FROM Financial_Statements WHERE id = 101 AND statement_type = 'Income'
DELETE FROM Financial_Statements WHERE statement_date < '2022-01-01' AND reconciled = FALSE
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM audit_logs WHERE statement_id = 1);
DELETE FROM reconciliation_records WHERE statement_id = (SELECT id FROM financial_statements WHERE statement_name = 'Balance Sheet' AND statement_date = '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM financial_statement WHERE id = 1 AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM auditor WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM reconciliations WHERE statement_id = 1 AND auditor_id = 100
